title: Geomechanica
content: Freelance project for a geological engineering company. This was a full website build using Wordpress with the design provided by the client.

title: Worldwide Association of Business Coaches
content: Full website build for an online business accreditation company that was developed at Blue Eclipse Media. Features complex user memberships, applications and approval processes that needed to be streamlined online.

title: Canadian Paralympic Committee Mobile App
content:
Hybrid mobile app built with Ionic Framework at Industrial Agency. Led the research and integration of Ionic Framework using Angular.js and was deployed to IOS and Android platforms.

 Note: App is no longer available online.

title: Buggly - Bug Tracker
content: Personal bug tracking application built with React, Firebase, Redux, Router, Bootstrap and CSS Modules

title: React Portfolio Website
content: This website! Minimalistic and responsive website built with React.
